item.title: [BEAM-2787] IllegalArgumentException with MongoDbIO with empty PCollection
item.description:
We have read a file and created a PCollection of Strings where each record represent one line on the file. There after we have multiple PTransforms to validate the records. In the end The Pcollection was filtered into two PCollection , one with all valid records and one with all invalid records. Now both the pcollections are stored to respective mongo db collections . In case if any of these pcollection is empty we are facing below exception trace :

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment:
Possible Resolution :

Class : MongoDbIO

Method Name : Flush

Possible fix :

private void flush() {
if (this.batch != null && this.batch.size() > 0) {
MongoDatabase mongoDatabase = this.client.getDatabase(this.spec.database());    MongoCollection mongoCollection = mongoDatabase.getCollection(this.spec.collection());    mongoCollection.insertMany(this.batch);    this.batch.clear();
}
}
